title: (x) NBC's new corporate typeface - SF Chaerilidae {Dav}
content:
NBC TV is using a font on air as well as their website [http://www.nbc.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060524205755/http:/www.nbc.com/) Itâ€™s the squarish typeface that resembles Bank Gothic and Eurostyle. Does anyone know what it is? I attached a sample or you can go to the website.
